cluster_relations.rel_desc: Strangers in the legends use candy as bait to lure children.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject uses the object specifically as bait to attract or lure a target.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Predatory Strangers in Cautionary Urban Legends
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Bait Objects in Child-Luring Urban Legends

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Candy functions as an enticing element attracting children in these legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject functions as an enticing or attractive element that draws the attention, approach, or presence of the object, often enabling a subsequent harmful or instrumental action.
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Bait Objects in Child-Luring Urban Legends
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Child Victims in Cautionary Urban Legends
remarks: Relation added to capture the instrumental role of candy relative to children.
